title: Focus, grasshopper
author: VD
content_html: I don’t know how well that went, but Mr. Brown did keep me on for 15 minutes more than I’d been scheduled, so I suppose it must have been okay. There probably wasn’t a lot new there for readers of this blog, but that’s the mass media for you. I did start wandering off a bit at one point – lesson: don’t read a book while being interviewed live on the radio.
